name:name: # ^ This file demonstrates four kinds of exploded columns:
# ^ spawnPos._* -> tuple {float,float,float} representing (x, y, z) coordinates
# ^ drops[*]    -> array of up to 3 item names that can drop on defeat
# ^ immunities is a NON-exploded array {Element}|nil for comparison with exploded arrays
# ^ attackPower uses an expression referencing 'baseDamage' published by Constant.tsv
